monthlyGoals.primary: Maximize summer fat loss while building strength and endurance
secondary: Progressive overload in morning strength sessions
Improve cardiovascular efficiency with varied cardio
Enhance muscle definition and reduce body fat
specificTargets: Reduce body fat by 2-3% by month end
Increase all major lift weights by 10-15 lbs
Achieve visible improvement in muscle definition

progressionNotes.week1: Build on June foundation, increase weights 5-10 lbs
progressionNotes.week2: Progressive overload, add sets or reps to major exercises

progressionNotes.week4: Higher volume for definition, focus on muscle fatigue
